attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MMY85lnukv2sU7aCCgr_description
attribs.current:
When you damage a creature larger
than you, you can inflict damage equal to your level. This ability is recovered after a short or long rest.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MMY8J4Uq5esmAzqOHTs_description
attribs.current: You can use Disengage or Hide as a bonus action on your turn.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MMY8ii2LcURNj9Pr7-F_description
attribs.current: On Your turn, you can use a bonus actrion to regain hitpoints equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. Recharges on a short / long rest.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MMY8wsoy2F5wiIeI6cV_description
attribs.current:
On your turn you can take an additional action or bonus action
Recharges on a short / long rest

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MMY92qdATn8q9JRq9SN_description
attribs.current: Can attack twice when you take the attack action. (Weapons with the loading property can still only be fired once.)

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MMY9tRpFmxnXny407t9_description
attribs.current: Your weapon attacks store a critical hits when you roll a 19 or 20.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MMYBQ5oywjrFYeX0mxy_description
attribs.current:
Thanks to extensive practice with the crossbow, you gain the following benefits:

You ignore the loading quality of crossbows with which you are proficient.

Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesnt impose disadvantage on your ranged attack rolls.

When you use the Attack action and attack with a one handed weapon, you can use a bonus action to attack with a hand crossbow you are holding.
